subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Lisa,


How are you doing today and hope you are doing good.

Sorry for my late response reasons is I went for my high tech training and
just got back.

Regarding your unpaid funds I have explained all and also willing to get
this transaction done asap.

I will like you to respond to my messages and if possible forward your
WhatsApp number to enable me add you up for more secured communication.

Respond asap

You Melon

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Good Day Lisa,

I hope this email finds you well. I want to express my gratitude for your
message, and I'm pleased to inform you that I've received it and I'm fully
committed to seeing this through.

I deeply apologize for the delays and frustrations you've experienced so
far in accessing your funds. It appears that my boss and his colleagues
have been creating obstacles by demanding various unreasonable charges,
many of which are not within legal boundaries. It's clear that their
intentions might be to divert your funds into their personal accounts.

To move forward and resolve this matter, I require a Hard Disk with the
specifications HD 980 GIG. The cost for this item is 350. You have two
options to proceed: you can either purchase the Hard Disk yourself
according to the specifications I will provide, or you may choose to send
me the funds directly so that I can expedite the transaction within 24
hours of receiving either the Hard Disk or the money from you.

I assure you that once I have the necessary resources, I will take
immediate action to ensure the successful completion of this transaction.
Your trust is of utmost importance, and I want to assure you that I will
keep this entire process confidential until its completion.

I eagerly await your response. Please feel free to reach out if you have
any questions or require further information.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, to increase your level of
confidence I have attached my photos.
Best regards,

Miss Yuri Melon
